title: on me by section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961), hereby
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign 

Driving Licences) (Ukraine) (Revocation) Order 2022. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 27th July 2022.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited road traffic (recognition foreign driving licences) (ukraine) (revocation) order 2022 (2) order come operation 27th july 2022

title: on me by section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961), hereby
heading: 2. The Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign Driving Licences) (Ukraine)
text_raw:
2. The Road Traffic (Recognition of Foreign Driving Licences) (Ukraine) 

Order 2022 (S.I. No. 192 of 2022) is revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

27 July, 2022. 

EAMON RYAN, 

Minister for Transport.. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 2nd August, 2022. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [391] 3
text_norm: 2 road traffic (recognition foreign driving licences) (ukraine) order 2022 (s.i no 192 2022) revoked given official seal 27 july 2022 eamon ryan minister transport notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 2nd august 2022 391 3

title: on me by section 23A of the Road Traffic Act 1961 (No. 24 of 1961), hereby
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order provides for the revocation of the Road Traffic (Recognition of 
Foreign Driving Licences) (Ukraine) Order 2022 (S.I. No. 192 of 2022). 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [391]
